attributes.action: Shorten the 6 week school holiday and spread the remaning weeks into other school holidays
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Shorten the school summer holiday down to about 3-4 weeks and take the extra 2-3 weeks and add them on to other holidays. For example Christmas and Easter.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
